errorResponses.403: API Limit Reached or API Key Disabled

nameTypeBatch.summary: Detect if proper nouns are personal names or public names (ex: John Smith : personal name, Namsor: brand name). You can inspect up to a 100 names

nameTypeGeoBatch.summary: Detect if proper nouns are personal names or a public names, according to their local context (ex: John Smith : personal name, Namsor: brand name). You can inspect up to 100 names

corridorBatch.summary: Infer several classifications for up to 100 cross border interaction between names (ex. remit, travel, intl com)

genderGeoBatch.summary: Detect the likely gender of up to 100 names, according to their local context

genderBatch.summary: Find the likely gender of up to 100 names

genderFullBatch.summary: Detect the likely gender of up to 100 full names

genderFullGeoBatch.summary: Detect the likely gender of up to 100 full names, according to their local context

originBatch.summary: Detect the likely country of origin of up to 100 first and last names

countryBatch.summary: Infer the likely country of residence of up to 100 full names or last names

usRaceEthnicityBatch.summary: Detect the most likely U.S. race or ethnicity of a up to 100 U.S. residents' first and last names

usZipRaceEthnicityBatch.operationName: US ZIP Race and Ethnicity Batch
usZipRaceEthnicityBatch.summary: Determine the most likely U.S. race or ethnicity of up to 100 U.S. residents' first and last names, using their ZIP code

diasporaBatch.summary: Infer the likely ethnicity or diaspora of up to 100 names, according to their country of residence

parseNameBatch.summary: Detect the likely first and last name structure of up to 100 full names

parseNameGeoBatch.summary: Detect the likely first and last name structure of up to 100 full names. For better accuracy, provide a local context

parseChineseNameBatch.summary: Detect the likely first and last name structure of up to 100 a Chinese names, written in Mandarin, ex. 王晓明 -> 王(lastname) 晓明(first name)

pinyinChineseNameBatch.summary: Romanize a list of up to 100 Chinese names to Pinyin

chineseNameMatchBatch.summary: Identify Chinese name candidates, based on the romanized name (firstName = chineseGivenName; lastName=chineseSurname), ex. Wang Xiaoming

genderChineseNamePinyinBatch.summary: Find out the likely gender of up to 100 Chinese first and last names, written in Pinyin

genderChineseNameBatch.summary: Infer the likely gender of up to 100 Chinese full names, written in Mandarin

chineseNameCandidatesBatch.summary: Find the most likely Mandarin transcriptions for up to 100 Chinese first and last names, written in Pinyin

chineseNameCandidatesGenderBatch.summary: Find the most likely transcriptions for a romanized Chinese first name and last name

parseJapaneseNameBatch.summary: Split up to 100 Japanese full names, in Kanji or Latin writing, into first name and last name structures

japaneseNameKanjiCandidatesBatch.summary: Find the likely transcriptions to Kanji, for up to 100 Japanese romanized first and last names

japaneseNameGenderKanjiCandidatesBatch.operationName: Japanese Name Gender Kanji Candidates Batch
japaneseNameGenderKanjiCandidatesBatch.summary: Find the likely transcriptions to Kanji, for up to 100 Japanese romanized first and last names, according to a known gender

japaneseNameLatinCandidatesBatch.summary: Romanize up to 100 japanese names written in Kanji

japaneseNameMatchBatch.summary: Return a score for matching a list of Japanese names in KANJI ex. 山本 早苗 with romanized names ex. Yamamoto Sanae

genderJapaneseNamePinyinBatch.summary: Discover the likely gender of a up to 100 Japanese first and last names written in Latin alphabet

genderJapaneseNameFullBatch.summary: Find the likely gender of up to 100 Japanese full names, written in Kanji

phoneCodeBatch.summary: Identify the likely country and phone prefix of up to 100 names and phone numbers (formatted or unformatted)

phoneCodeGeoBatch.summary: Identify the likely phone prefix of up to 100 names and phone numbers (formatted or unformatted) according to local context
